briefdescription.para: Output Data published at the end of cycle.
Mutex for publishing and modifying data.
Flag for continueing listener thread execution.
Current value table for subscribed messages.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Battery Monitor Task application entry point. This function performs app initialization, then waits for the cFE ES Startup Sync, then executes the main processing loop.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: If there is an unrecoverable failure during initialization the main loop is never executed and the application will exit.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Battery Monitor application initialization routine. This function performs all the required startup steps to initialize (or restore from CDS) BAT data structures and get the application registered with the cFE services so it can begin to receive command messages and send events.

briefdescription.para: Initialize Event Services and Event tables.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to setup cFE Event Services for use by the BAT application.

briefdescription.para: Initialize global variables used by BAT application.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to initialize the BAT application data.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to setup initialize the cFE Software Bus message pipes and subscribe to messages for the BAT application.

briefdescription.para: Receive and process messages from the scheduler pipe.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function receives and processes messages for the BAT application from the SCH pipe. This function will pend for the type defined by iBlocking, allowing it to wait for messages, i.e. wakeup messages from scheduler.

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_PEND_FOREVER, CFE_SB_POLL or millisecond timeout

briefdescription.para: Battery Monitor Task incoming command processing.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function processes incoming commands subscribed by BAT application

briefdescription.para: Battery Monitor Task incoming data processing.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function processes incoming data subscribed by BAT application

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function processes command messages specific to the BAT application

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_Msg_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function sends the housekeeping message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function verifies the command message length.

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_Msg_t pointer that references the software bus message
The expected length of the message

simplesect.para: if the message length matches expectations, FALSE if it does not.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This is the executing function of the child task

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function initializes BAT's configuration table.

briefdescription.para: Obtain BAT configuration tables data pointers.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function manages the configuration tables and obtains a pointer to their data.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is evaluated in the child task loop to determine if the child task should continue cycling

entry.para: TRUE if yes FALSE if not

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function stops execution of the child task by setting the continue execution flag to false

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function intitializes the child task with CFE

entry.para: CFE_SUCCESS if success, error code otherwise

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function returns the filtered voltage value

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function returns the filtered current value

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function returns the filtered throttle vlaue

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function returns amount of mAh discharged from the battery

memberdef.argsstring: (float Voltage, float Current, float ThrottleNormalized, osalbool Armed)
memberdef.name: GetRemaining

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function returns the amount of charge remaining.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function returns the current severity of battery level based on configured values

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function returns the voltage scale

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function publishes the battery status message to the CFE SB

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function intializes the custom layer for the battery driver

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function closes the custom layer driver

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function reads the battery information from the connected device

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function validates BAT's configuration table

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the table to validate.
